title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Creating a trail through the woods. NPS Photo  Looking for how to get involved? Check out the links below: NPS Centennial The National Park Service is celebrating the Centennial of its creation in 2016. Find out how Pictured Rocks is celebrating this milestone. Partners The staff at Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore work closely with many federal, state, and local organizations. Volunteer Please consider volunteering your time and talent at Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore. You will enjoy putting your skills to work in this beautiful setting, and you will meet many other fine people who have similar interests. Work With Us A wide variety of exciting and challenging employment opportunities await you at Pictured Rocks. Do Business With Us Commercial Use or Special Park Use Permits are needed in Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore. Download the specific permits and find out more information on what you need for your business or event to flourish. Planning Park plans such as general management, fire management, administrative history, and scope of collections statements are available for the public to download. Sustainablility Learn how Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore has progressively worked to develop and adopt sustainable practices. Support Your Park If you are interested in doing more to support the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore and other National Park Service areas, you have many park support opportunities to chose from.
